initial-head-text: HELPS TEAMS TO MOVE WORK FORWARD
initial-head-undertext: Collaborate, manage projects, and reach new productivity peaks
second-head-text: It’s more than work. It’s a way of working together.
second-body-text: Manage projects, organize tasks, and build team spirit-all in one place. Customize and expand with more features as your teamwork grows. Start with a Taskery board, lists, and cards.
password-length-error: Password must be at least 6 characters long
password-pattern-error: Your password must contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase, and one number
side-undertext: The best project management tool for high quality development.
login-text: Taskery is designed to ensure that every member of your development team can plan, track, and deliver great software.
tell-us: Tell us more about how we can help you
request-details: Please provide us with the details on how we can assist you, and we will get back to you via email as soon as possible
contact-text: Align, collaborate, and gain visibility into your work in one connected space
second-contact-body-text: Centralize all your work, processes, tools, and files into one Work OS. Connect teams, bridge silos, and maintain one source of truth across your organization.
contact-undertext: Meet with a product consultant to see how Taskery can fit your exact business needs
contact-undertext2: We are ready to guide you through our toolkit and help you achieve your goals with ease
contact-undertext3: Boost productivity from day one by building your team's ideal workflow
sure-delete: Are you sure you want to delete your profile?
see-day-tasks: see your tasks for the day
email-assigned: Send email when assigned to the project
email-new: Send email when get new task
email-updated: Send email when task is updated
i-assigned: I am assigned to the project
no-data: There is no data to display, you don't have any project
switch-role: If you would like to start your own project, please register new special (Project Manager) account
assign-to: Assign this project to the employees
sure-project: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
sure-task: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
